text:
Local Government (Restructuring) Amendment Order 1998

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under the Local Government Act 1993 .

7 August 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. SWAN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Restructuring) Amendment Order 1998 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Local Government (Restructuring) Order 1998 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Local Government (Restructuring) Order 1998 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 7 August 1998

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
